notes: Reviews works by John Findley, Philippe Caza, Dan Clowes, William Messner-Loebs, and Jim Woodring.

116.heading: Findsen, Owen.
116.title: "Buck Rogers Rockets to Art Museum"
116.author: Owen Findsen
116.appears_in: p. C-8 in The Cincinnati Enquirer (Nov. 10, 1992)
notes: Column on an exhibit at Miami University (Oxford, Ohio), titled "The Future According to Buck Rogers," showing Nov. 8, 1992 to Mar. 13, 1993, and featuring original art by Chuck Yeager (i.e., Rick Yager).

117.title: Findakly, Brigitte
notes: French comics colorist
